Background

Enterprise Architect with 25 years of experience in technology, including 13 years specializing in life sciences and regulated environments.

Experience

Cognizant - Enterprise Architect
Currently architecting platforms serving 300,000+ users across clinical trials and regulatory environments. Focus areas include:

  • Cloud platform architecture (AWS)
  • GxP and HIPAA compliance frameworks
  • Clinical trials management systems
  • Regulatory submission platforms
  • Enterprise-scale system design

Technical Expertise

Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS, enterprise-scale architecture, high-availability systems

Regulated Environments: GxP compliance, HIPAA, clinical trials, regulatory affairs

item.title: Welcome to My Technical Blog
item.description:
This is my new central hub for technical writing. I’ve been writing on Medium and LinkedIn, but I’m consolidating everything here for better control and ownership of my content.

What to Expect

I write about enterprise architecture, cloud platforms, and building systems at scale in regulated environments. Expect deep dives into:

  • Architecture patterns and tradeoffs
  • AWS and cloud infrastructure
  • GxP compliance and regulated systems
  • Technical leadership and strategy
